profile:
We cover the whole of the GTA and beyond and carry most major brands of hardwood, laminate, carpet, tile and vinyl. We are also ICC (Insurance Claims Collaborative) registered for restoration of damaged floors.
 
Why not pop in to our showroom in Newmarket or Thornhill  where you can see our collection first hand, along with current special offers, or visit www.floorsdirectnorth.ca
 
We offer a shop-at-home service, first-class customer care and a friendly smile. Our customers are important to us and whilst we aren't perfect, we try hard and pride ourselves on the care and attention we give to every project. Our installers are masters in their fields and you can rest assured you'll be very happy with the installation of your chosen flooring. 
 
We also specialize in custom made stairs. 
 
You can also visit our second location 
134 Doncaster Ave
Units 1 & 2
Thornhill
905 235 7155
service_area:
NEW LOCATION IN THORNHILL - 134 Doncaster Ave, Thornhill, ON. L3T 1L6 - 905 709 7999

Serving the GTA including, Thornhill, Richmond Hill, Markham, North York, Newmarket, Aurora, Bradford, Sharon, King, Oak Ridges, Stouffville, Beeton, Tottenham, Georgina, Keswick, Sutton, Innisfil.

profile:
The Home of Satisfied Customers!

Flooring Liquidators is your one stop , full package solution when it comes to flooring. With our expanding retail locations, large purchasing power and connections with local and foreign flooring manufacturers, we are able to offer our customers top quality flooring at the most competitive prices.

The Largest Flooring Selection

Flooring Liquidators carries a wide array of Canadian and Exotic flooring products. We’ve earned a high reputation with our products and services, and we’ve been the go-to retail store for many homeowners, contractors, realtors, designers, and builders.

Our tagline is ‘Everything is on Sale’ because of our affordable prices. We offer no compromise on our flooring products, since everything is backed by a manufacturer’s warranty to offer you peace of mind.

Visit one of our Showrooms Near you!

Flooring Liquidators currently has 13 showrooms and is rapidly expanding with the aim of becoming a dominant force in the flooring industry. Our service areas are all of the GTA, Toronto, Brampton, Hamilton, Oshawa, Mississauga, Newmarket, Barrie, London, and Ottawa. Contact us now for a location near you.

profile: SkyLane Construction Services Inc. is a full service company that offer a broad range of services for your home, investment properties, commercial and cottage. Our experience and skills backs our ability to successfully complete projects of all sizes, ranging from property maintenance, handyman services, residential & commercial renovation, home addition, basement finishing, home & office detailing. Whether your goal are to improve upon, remodel or to maintain your property, our commitment to you is to make certain that your home, investment properties or cottage needs are successfully met through expertise, craftsmanship and meticulous attention to details. SkyLane provides warranty on all workmanship for a period of 1 year.

profile:
At TERĀIN Landscaping Construction Inc., our client-centric approach focuses on creating the best customer experience on every project. Whether it is designing a new walkway to guide the path home or cleaning up an area of the backyard that lacks flow, our team is dedicated to providing excellent craftsmanship to reinvigorate even the most complex spaces. Our construction keeps longevity in mind, as clients continue to feel satisfied with project outcomes well into the future.

While TERĀIN Landscaping Construction Inc. is fairly new, our passionate, organized and hardworking team brings over 10 years of experience to the table. Needless to say, we are motivated to ensure that each client is 100% satisfied. If you can dream it, we can elaborate on the vision through innovative design ideas that translate a simple idea to a stunning reality. 

Explore our professional drone footage and navigate through our reviews to see for yourself.

Sprayman Group Installs Commercial & Industrial Interior Flooring Services - The Sprayman Group provides unique flooring protection, renewal and maintenance options resulting in high-quality, attractive and durable finishes.

Sprayman repairs concrete decks, floors, sidewalks, steps and foundations.  We also offer concrete grinding and concrete polishing for all of our residential and commercial customers.

We will contact you within 24 hours of receiving your request.
services:
Concrete repairs; decks, floors, sidewalks, steps and foundations.

Epoxy-type floor coatings for garages, basements, porches, stairs, as well as industrial and commercial settings

Asphalt repairs; cracks, potholes, sealing, line painting, driveway curb repairs (where asphalt meets garage curb), catch basin repairs.
